---
title: "Data and Code for the Poster"
subtitle: "Improving understanding of wood formation: a comparison of two models"
---


This Website prvides the data for the graphs that were presented in the Poster at the EGU General Assembly 2019 ([https://www.egu2019.eu/),
session BG2.12 - Constraining present and future global vegetation dynamics and carbon stocks.

By Annemarie H. Eckes-Shephard (1), Cyrille B. K. Rathgeber (2), Patrick Fonti (3), Tim T. Rademacher (4,5,6) , Andrew D. Richardson (4,5), and Andrew D. Friend (1).


The Abstract can be found on https://meetingorganizer.copernicus.org/EGU2019/EGU2019-17876.pdf


The poster can be viewed again here: 
https://github.com/teatree1212/EGU2019_poster_supplementaries/blob/master/data/EGU_poster_V5.pdf


 ```{r out.width = "4400px",echo=FALSE}

knitr::include_graphics('Poster_final.jpg')

 
```
